greeter.info: The dashboard lets you see important things to do.

support.heading: Support & Feedback
support.info: Help us make GRUD even better
support.feedback-placeholder: Report a bug, send us a note, or give us kudos :)

taxonomy.title: Start with your first category
taxonomy.description: Contact our GRUD support team to have us create the category tables you require. When that's done you'll be able to enter and edit categories to your heart's desire.
